Posts.EditableText: Which function is the display order in? I'd like to have the room description come up first, then a blank line, then the objects, then a blank line, then the exits.
Posts.HTML: Which function is the display order in? I'd like to have the room description come up first, then a blank line, then the objects, then a blank line, then the exits.

Posts.EditableText: Look on the Room description tab of the game object.
Posts.HTML: Look on the Room description tab of the game object.

Posts.EditableText: thanks. that was the simple solution I was missing.
